reuters.title: FHLMC <FREPR> 4TH QTR NET
reuters.body: net 65 mln vs 57 mln year shr preferred 14.87 dlrs vs 12.51 dlrs shr common 236.77 dlrs vs 197.40 dlrs net 247 mln vs 208 mln NOTE: Federal Home Loan Mortgage Corp. FHLMC had 14,998,210 preferred shares outstanding in 1986 vs 14,998,379 in 1985, owned by about 3,000 member institutions of the 12 Federal Home Loan Banks. FHLMC also has 100,000 shares of common, owned by the Home Loan Banks. Reuter 
